Topics include: Local marine fisheries impact program (LMFIP) information; Pipeline; Fisheries update, vessel safety, oil and gas and platform information, marine debris projects, gear testing, grants available, POE/Texaco, Channel water study, Navy acoustic operations, Harbor facilities, Tagging study, Encounters between whales and boaters, pollution study, MARPOL, Limited entry, weather buoys, ROV/spot prawn projects, oil spill training, Seafloor hazards survey, Shrouds to be placed over pipelines, Unlit surface current meter buoys, Sea otter translocation, Loran-C, Chevron oil, Vessel traffic corridor problems, ROV for fisheries research, and more.
